name: Accursed Horde
originalText: {1}{B}: Target attacking Zombie gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)

rulings.text: Accursed Horde’s ability can target itself while it’s attacking.
The target Zombie gains indestructible for the rest of the turn, even after it stops being an attacking creature.
